heading: HR00923
0: RESOLUTION FOR THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO URGENTLY CALL OUT TO THE INTERNET PROVIDERS IN THE PHILIPPINES SUCH AS THE FIXED LINE PROVIDERS AND THE MOBILE BROADBAND SEGMENT TO UPGRADE THEIR SYSTEMS AS THE USE OF THE INTERNET HIGHWAY HAS EXPANDED EXPONENTIALLY MOST ESPECIALLY DURING THIS GLOBAL COVID-19 PANDEMIC CRISIS
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-06-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00923
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION FOR THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO URGENTLY CALL OUT TO THE INTERNET PROVIDERS IN THE PHILIPPINES SUCH AS THE FIXED LINE PROVIDERS AND THE MOBILE BROADBAND SEGMENT TO UPGRADE THEIR SYSTEMS AS THE USE OF THE INTERNET HIGHWAY HAS EXPANDED EXPONENTIALLY MOST ESPECIALLY DURING THIS GLOBAL COVID-19 PANDEMIC CRISIS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SAVELLANO, DEOGRACIAS VICTOR "DV" B.
DATE FILED : 2020-05-28
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE ON 2020-06-01
